level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-84, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-381.
For history of Law 19-86, see notes under § 15-361.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Foreign Money-Judgments Recognition Act. See 13 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
